subject: Pedal Order Shipping Issue
description_text:
I have recently ordered a set of the pro x ultra pedals but there appears
to be an issue with the FedEx shipping. The shipping info hasn't updated in
days and the pedals have not been delivered. Can you please assist in
finding and resolving this issue? I have attached the order  confirmation
below.

Thank you,
Kevin Moore

conversations.body_text: Hello, I note that the parcel has indeed been delayed, likely due to weather conditions. We shall investigate and follow up on this matter.

Thank you for your response. The pedals and base plate did arrive
yesterday. Sadly, the haptics kit that was also oredered was not delivered.

On Thu, Sep 18, 2025, 2:48 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Kevin Moore,     I must apologise for not replying to your email sooner. I see that your parcels have all been delivered. May I ask whether you have received them? https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045903944658

Yes, the second package arrived a day later. Thanks for checking in

On Tue, Sep 23, 2025, 5:03 AM service@simsonn.com
